item.title: Report E-2024040509
item.description:
Report E-2024040509

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-25T15:11:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING UNLOADING OPERATIONS, THE HIGH-LEVEL SENSOR ON FACILITY STORAGE TANK FAILED TO OPERATE CAUSING THE TANK TO OVERFLOW AND SPILL 5 GALLONS OF PRODUCT ONTO THE RUBBER CONTAINMENT MAT. OFFLOADING OPERATIONS WERE HAULTED. BALANCE OF LOAD MOVED TO SECODARY STORAGE TANK. OFFLOADING COMPLETED WITHOUT FURTHER INCIDENT. THE SPILL WAS CLEANED UP BY PLANT PERSONNELL.

item.title: Report X-2024040964
item.description:
Report X-2024040964

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-27
  • City: OAK PARK
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in a bin next to the hazmat cage in the middle of outbound shift. DescribePack: 1 out of 2 jugs of convoclean forte had a loose cap and leaked. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was place in a red hazmat bin outside the hazmat cage.
